summary: Initial roadmap created for snow-discovery-agent with 5 phases and 25 tickets. Phase 1 (Foundation) is active with 6 tickets. Next ticket: DISC-001 (Initialize Python project structure). GitHub issue creation pending -- requires gh CLI access.

next_ticket_details.title: Initialize Python project structure with pyproject.toml and package layout

recommendations: GitHub issues have not been created yet for any tickets. Run /forge-plan again with gh CLI access to sync all 25 tickets to GitHub issues.
DISC-001 (Initialize Python project structure) is ready for the Build Agent -- no dependencies, critical priority, small complexity.
After DISC-001 completes, DISC-002 (REST client), DISC-003 (Pydantic models), and DISC-004 (config) can be worked in parallel as they share only DISC-001 as a dependency.
Velocity is zero -- this is expected for a brand-new project with no completed tickets yet.
